examples.example: 我今天去银行办理业务，工作人员热情又专业。

translate.english: I went to the bank to handle business today, and the staff was enthusiastic and professional.

examples.example: 每次去银行，工作人员都微笑着为我提供优质的服务，让人感觉特别温暖。

translate.english: Every time I go to the bank, the staff smiles and provides me with high-quality service, which makes people feel particularly warm.

examples.example: 我每次去银行，那里的工作人员都很有礼貌地为我答疑解惑。

translate.english: Every time I go to the bank, the staff there are very polite in answering my questions and clearing my doubts.
